resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/50942</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>50942</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020605</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020605</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Otros usos</string>
            <string language="en">Other uses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anderes Gebrauch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Autre utilisations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Outro usos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Altro usi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλες χρήσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se indican otras posibilidades de uso del diccionario: el valor de los sufijos griegos, la comparación con el español en los helenismos o la evolución semántica de un término desde su original griego hasta la forma castellana correspondiente.</string>
            <string language="en">Other possibilities are indicated for using the dictionary; the value of the Greek suffixes, the comparison with Spanish in Hellenisms or the semantic evolution of a term from its Greek original to the corresponding Spanish form.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">diccionario</string>
            <string language="en">Dictionary</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Andere Möglichkeiten werden für das Verwenden 
des Verzeichnisses angezeigt; der Wert der griechischen Suffixe,
der Vergleich mit Spanischen in Hellenisms oder die semantische 
Entwicklung einer Bezeichnung von seiner griechischen Vorlage zum 
entsprechenden spanischen Formular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'autres possibilités sont indiquées pour 
l'usage du dictionnaire ; la valeur des suffixes grecs, la 
comparaison avec l'Espagnol dans les Hellénismes ou l'évolution 
sémantique d'une limite de son original grec à la forme espagnole 
correspondante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Outras possibilidades são indicadas usando o 
dicionário; o valor dos sufixos gregos, a comparação com 
espanhol em Hellenisms ou a evolução semântica de um termo de seu 
original grego ao formulário espanhol correspondente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Altre possibilità sono indicate per usando il 
dizionario; il valore dei suffissi greci, il confronto con lo 
Spagnolo in Hellenisms o lo sviluppo semantico di un termine dal 
relativo originale greco alla forma spagnola corrispondente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλες δυνατότητες είναι υποδειγμένες για τη 
χρησιμοποίηση του λεξικού  η αξία των ελληνικών επιθημάτων,
η σύγκριση με τα ισπανικά σε Hellenisms ή η σημασιολογική 
εξέλιξη ενός όρου από τα ελληνικά του αρχικά στην αντίστοιχη 
ισπανική μορφή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dictionnaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dicionário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dizionario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεξικό</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
